nodes.text: Cervil, known as Cervil the Uncanny, was a female Jedi who fought in the Sith Wars. She left behind testimonies about the use of lightwhips to defend against Sith Lords using the Forbidden Forms. A long time after the conflict, during the High Republic Era when the Sith were believed to be extinct, Cervil's testimonies were cited by Jedi Knight Vernestra Rwoh to Padawan Imri Cantaros as proof that the Jedi Order had historically used lightwhips.
